name: Idle Clothes Clicker
description:
Prototype of Idle clicker game made in Unity where you can make t-shirts and sell them. Made mainly for educational purposes.

This game contains a lot of t-shirts and nicely formatted numbers! It doesn't contain a saving feature, but that's okay, since you can easily finish it in 10 minutes!

Click on the t-shirt, upgrade the level and buy production accelerations! 

Game ends when you achieve everything that is prepared to be achieved.

PS Needs a lot improvements, I know, but I don't plan to work on this anymore. You can see the source code here: https://github.com/sjasionowska/IdleClothesClicker Feel free to learn from my successes and mistakes.  ^^
